DOC.brief_summary: To assess immunogenicity safety vero cell-derived inactivated JE vaccine Korean healthy child age 12~23 month
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Immunogenicity Safety Vero Cell-derived JE Vaccine Korea
DOC.detailed_description: To compare Vero cell-derived inactivated Japanese encephalitis ( JE ) vaccine 'KD-287 ( JEIMMUGEN INJ . ) ' mouse brain-derived inactivated JE vaccine term immunogenicity safety , Korean healthy child age 12~23 month
DOC.criteria: Healthy child age 1223 month Written inform consent History document HIV Known suspect impairment immunologic function History serious chronic disease Received JE vaccine prior enrollment
